"Having borne a great burden in the building up of the Battle Creek Sanitarium, Elder and Mrs. White took special pleasure in encouraging a like work in 
                                                                           459
California, which resulted in the development of the St. Helena Sanitarium--started as the Rural Health Retreat. A lifelong physical sufferer, Mrs. White's sympathies have ever been drawn out to the afflicted. In connection with three other medical missionary enterprises in California,--at Paradise Valley, near San Diego; at Glendale, near Los Angeles; and at Loma Linda,--Mrs. White has borne heroic burdens and rendered great assistance. This is especially true of the College of Medical Evangelists at Loma Linda.
